Class GenericTypeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.core.reflect.GenericTypeUtils

  • public class GenericTypeUtils
extends Object
    Utility methods for dealing with generic types.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher

                                                           Class interfaceType)

        Parameters:

        interfaceType - The interface to resolve for
        Returns:
        The class or null

      • resolveInterfaceTypeArguments

        public static Class[] resolveInterfaceTypeArguments(Class<?> type,
                                                    Class<?> interfaceType)
        Resolve all of the type arguments for the given interface from the given type. Also searches superclasses.
        Parameters:
        type - The type to resolve from
        interfaceType - The interface to resolve from
        Returns:
        The type arguments to the interface

        Parameters:
        type - The type to resolve from
        superType - The interface to resolve from
        Returns:
        The type arguments to the interface
